UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile in the application.

photoURL.description: The URL of the user's profile picture.

Project.title: Project
Project.description: Represents a construction project in the portfolio.

description.description: A detailed description of the project.

imageUrls.description: A list of URLs for the project images.

tags.description: A list of tags associated with the project.

featured.description: Whether the project is featured on the homepage.

authorUid.description: The UID of the user who created the project.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the project was created.

ContactMessage.title: Contact Message
ContactMessage.description: Represents a message submitted through the contact form.

name.description: The name of the person who submitted the message.

email.description: The email of the person who submitted the message.

phone.description: The phone number of the person who submitted the message.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the message was submitted.

read.description: Whether the admin has read the message.

/projects.description: Stores all the construction projects for the portfolio.

/contact-messages.description: Stores messages submitted through the contact form.
